system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision dynamic list. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2013-05-20 16:15:17 -0700 (Mon, 20 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92557 $"
deferred class ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_IMP [G -> ../interface/ev_containable.xmlEV_CONTAINABLE]
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_I [G] redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Initialization
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize the dynamic list. do create ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falsemake (0) ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
feature -- Access
f_i_th../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_i_thi_th (i: FalseINTEGER_32): like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem -- Item at i-th position. do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falsei_th (i) end
feature -- Measurement
f_count../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_countcount: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Number of items. do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array.Falsecount end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_insert_i_th../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem; i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Insert v at position i. deferred end
f_remove_i_th../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Remove item at i-th position. deferred end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_child_array../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_child_arraychild_array: FalseARRAYED_LIST [G]
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST [G] note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2012, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_IMP
